alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 6:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 715 PM MST... At 630 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms extending from Estrella to near Chui-Chu. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, Casa Grande, Maricopa, Estrella, Arizona City, Palo Verde, Big Horn, Cotton Center, Liberty, Estrella Sailport, Arizola, Estrella Mountain Park, Estrella Mountain Ranch, Toltec, Bosque, Freeman, Sonoran National Monument and Hassayampa. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 185 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 125 and 178. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 5 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County
